item.title: Raichur officer suspended for neglecting survey work
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur Deputy Commissioner Nitish K. has placed an officer of the Backward Classes Welfare Department under suspension on the charge of negligence in conducting social and educational survey which began on September 22.
In a release here on Saturday, Mr. Nitish stated that Ramesh G. Rathod was assigned the social and educational survey work in Lingsugur taluk. But he was negligent in carrying out the survey as instructed.
His negligent attitude caused a set-back to the survey and this was bro...]]>
